summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. Cosmetics's Brow Lift is an extreme-hold, clear eyebrow shaping wax that holds your brows in place for a fluffy "soap brow," feathered look.
details: DetailsBenefitsExtreme, long-lasting holdLifts, tames & sculpts brows for a feathered effectClear, natural, universal finish for all skin tones & brow colorsAloe-infused conditioning formula nourishes brow hairsCruelty-freeFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2591801How To UseBend spoolie end of applicator and gently dip into gel. On clean brows, brush up and out while pressing down for your desired shape. Use the flat end of the applicator to press brows into place until set.External use only. Stop use if irritation occurs.IngredientsCeteareth-30, Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, EDTA-2NA.
how_to_use: Bend spoolie end of applicator and gently dip into gel. On clean brows, brush up and out while pressing down for your desired shape. Use the flat end of the applicator to press brows into place until set.External use only. Stop use if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product because it's super good
reviews.comments: it's so good if u have thick eyebrows this is the best

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Wish I loved this. Did not hold my brows in place for longer than 2 hours. The product is also flaky and sweats off.

reviews.headline: Forever mine
reviews.comments: This iwill be my forever for to until there is something better.y daughter got me hooked on this, so I try not to run and use it everyday.

reviews.headline: I like this but it's white not clear
reviews.comments: in the picture it's white but mine is white and I think there is something wrong with it and it leaves white chunks somtimes

reviews.headline: Slick Brows
reviews.comments: I do like the structure this product gives to my eyebrows. I don't like the white cast it gives hours in the day sometimes but over all a good product for the price. Not a huge fan of Elf's controversial and I may need to find a replacement soon.

reviews.headline: we're like toxic exes
reviews.comments: i always get other brow gels to try them out but i always go back to my girl, elf brow lift. it truly locks my brows in place, no icky white cast, AND you can't beat the price i mean cmon now!!

reviews.headline: pretty good
reviews.comments: love it, if it dont work add more and if u dont want it to look have a wet look add powder

reviews.headline: Tried and true brow gel
reviews.comments: I have used this brow gel for years and love it. For the price, it's hard to beat. I feel like it definitely keeps my stubborn brows in place. I prefer to apply before my base makeup as it can lift the foundation underneath.

reviews.headline: yes!
reviews.comments: obsessed!! holds really well and really separates the brow hairs. Elf does it again. Just a note: the product does not contain the spoolie or applicator. it's purchased separately. i just use another brow spoolie from a different product

reviews.headline: I loved it! Very heavy feeling though
reviews.comments: Holds eyebrows in place perfectly

reviews.headline: meh
reviews.comments: left my brows looking wet and weird and barely held my brows in place. the packaging is annoying and tiny ur brush has to be small to fix in it. it also broke me out around my brows after a few uses like huh??? very odd but its a pass for me

reviews.headline: If you want hold, this isn't it
reviews.comments:
Pros: not super sticky, doesnt flake 
Cons: no hold whatsoever- brows fall within minutes of application

reviews.headline: Ehhh
reviews.comments: This is great if you want a brow lift without actually getting one. But honestly after time like other reviews say it turns a murky white color and it gets nasty over time.

reviews.headline: does not dry down
reviews.comments: i mean, it's an okay brow product. it doesn't try down so my hair gets stuck in it, which can get annoying. if i was in desperate need for a cheap brow product, this still would not be my first option. maybe my tenth choice if i couldn't find literally anything else. it's okay.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again.
reviews.comments: Extremely flakey on my eyebrows

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: Wouldnt recommend. It dries white, and could be my makeup but it's honeslty just okay

reviews.headline: Stays on all day!
reviews.comments: I been using this product on my  eyebrows and and i alqays reccomend it to anyone who wants their brows to stay in place

reviews.headline: Will never stop buying this
reviews.comments: It does what it's supposed to do for a cheap price. Although I have found I do get a pimple in my eyebrows after use. Could just be me. Not enough to stop me from using it.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: My eyebrow hairs can get long(not bushy), this product doesn't do it for me. With this product I tried layering it too and kinda worked. Sometimes I would put some water and then product which did help more than layering(that's why I gave it 2 stars) But looking for something better where I can apply and actually see a difference. I used this product until I finished it, not for me.

faceoff_positive.comments: I just started doing my brows within the last year or so. When I first started, I started with a pomade (from ELF). I struggled with that a lot! I saw this product on TikTok and gave it a try.. When I tell you that I'm PARANOID to run out of this stuff or that it'll get discontinued, I'm not lying. My local stores and local Ulta rarely have it in stock.. so I order 4-5 of them at a time online. When I first started using this, I felt like there was a little bit of a sticky residue around my brows but literally that can be cleaned up with a Q-tip. The trick to this product is after you put it on your brows‚Äî first press the brow hairs down and shape them and then (this is important*) let the product completely dry before going in with a brow pencil/brow pen. I use the NYX Lift and Snatch brow pen. When I first bought this, I thought I had to have thick brows to make it work (which I don't). But that's not true.. take what ya got! Shape them, and then use a brow pen. It doesn't matter if your brows are more thin than other videos have shown with this product. It's possible to make it work! I do it every day! I hope this never gets discontinued üò©üôèüèª
faceoff_positive.headline: 10/10 ELF out did themselves!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was so excited to try this cause of the whole being a dupe for the Anastasia brow freeze (which I own but it's expensive so I was looking for an everyday product that didn't break the bank). I love the laminated brow look. I was blessed with good brows naturally so I don't have to fill them in and have thin longish hairs so they're very manageable. But since my brow hairs are long I need a brow gel. So I got this and I even got the little brow spooly that the brought out w this product. The spooly is great! This not so much! It works for a little bit but after an hr or so my hairs start loosing the laminated look and start falling down. So I tried using more product and the same thing happened but my brows started getting white fluffs from the product build up. Also it feels quite heavy on the brows and kind of greasy. 

Might have been made to be a dupe for the Anastasia brow freeze but DEFINITELY do not hit the mark!
faceoff_negative.headline: Just a no
